org.puredata.android.io

Class AudioParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.puredata.android.io.AudioParameters

  • public class AudioParameters
extends Object
    AudioParameters sniffs out the number of audio input and output channels as well as supported sample rates.
    Author:
    Peter Brinkmann (peter.brinkmann@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • suggestSampleRate

        public static int suggestSampleRate()
        Returns:
        a reasonable sample rate that the device supports, 0 if audio output is unavailable

      • suggestInputChannels

        public static int suggestInputChannels()
        Returns:
        the largest number of input channels that the device supports

      • suggestOutputChannels

        public static int suggestOutputChannels()
        Returns:
        the largest number of output channels that the device supports

      • suggestBufferSizeMillis

        public static float suggestBufferSizeMillis()
        Returns:
        suggested buffer size in milliseconds; suggests 100ms, i.e., a fairly conservative choice

      • checkParameters

        public static boolean checkParameters(int srate,
                      int nin,
                      int nout)
        Parameters:
        srate - sample rate
        nin - number of input channels
        nout - number of output channels
        Returns:
        true if and only if the device supports the given set of parameters

      • checkInputParameters

        public static boolean checkInputParameters(int srate,
                           int nin)
        Parameters:
        srate - sample rate
        nin - number of input channels
        Returns:
        true if and only if the device supports the given set of parameters

                            int nout)
        Parameters:
        srate - sample rate
        nout - number of output channels
        Returns:
        true if and only if the device supports the given set of parameters
